#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define s(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define s2(x,y) scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y)
#define wl(n) while(n--)
#define ll long long
#define p(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ll long long
#define rep(i,n) for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
#define REP(i,a,n) for(ll i=a;i<=n;i++)
#define PER(i,a,n) for(ll i=n-1;i>=a;i--)
#define mem(a,i) memset(a,i,sizeof(a))
#define F first
#define S second
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
vector<ll> v;
pii p;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define debug(x)  printf("####%d####\n",x);
#define nl printf("\n");
#define str string
int com(ll a,ll b){
	if(b==1)
	return 0;
	ll d=__gcd(a,b);
	if(d==1)
	return 1;
	return com(a,b/d);
}
int main(){
	int t;
	s(t);
	ll a,b;
	while(t--){
	s2(a,b);
	if(com(a,b))
	printf("No\n");
	else
	printf("Yes\n");
	
	}
return 0;}
